title: Who’s Racing Where, When? What to Expect Next Week When Pogačar, Vingegaard, Van Aert Stampede into 2025
content:
Here's what you need to know about the most hotly-hyped men's debuts of 2025 as racing clicks up a sprocket in the UAE and Europe.

Read the full article at Who’s Racing Where, When? What to Expect Next Week When Pogačar, Vingegaard, Van Aert Stampede into 2025 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
